articles.title: 'The Last of Us' for amphibians: University researchers trace emergence of fungus threatening African amphibians - EurekAlert
articles.description: In a new Frontiers in Conservation Science paper, San Francisco State University researchers detail the relatively recent emergence and spread of a deadly fungus (Batrachochytrium dendrobatidis or Bd) among amphibians in Africa. Eight of the co-authors are fo…
